ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A user-friendly interface for the construction of 'Makefiles'.
A user-friendly interface for the construction of 'Makefiles'.

name: r-makefiler
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-makefiler
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/MakefileR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/MakefileR/MakefileR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d4319083881abfc190ada3d998a76711ec429fa970f4231b12bbdecc7b5a2628

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-magrittr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-magrittr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('MakefileR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('MakefileR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://krlmlr.github.io/MakefileR
  dev_url: https://github.com/krlmlr/MakefileR
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: A user-friendly interface for the construction of 'Makefiles'.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'
# Encoding: UTF-8

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# Package: MakefileR
# Title: Create 'Makefiles' Using R
# Description: A user-friendly interface for the construction of 'Makefiles'.
# Version: 1.0
# Date: 2016-01-08
# Authors@R: person("Kirill", "Muller", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "krlmlr+r@mailbox.org")
# Imports: magrittr
# Suggests: testthat, knitr, rmarkdown
# License: GPL-3
# LazyData: true
# URLNote: https://github.com/krlmlr/MakefileR
# URL: http://krlmlr.github.io/MakefileR
# BugReports: https://github.com/krlmlr/MakefileR/issues
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# RoxygenNote: 5.0.1.9000
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2016-01-08 10:51:43 UTC; muelleki
# Author: Kirill Muller [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Kirill Muller <krlmlr+r@mailbox.org>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2016-01-08 15:55:12
